pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.entity.Message

  • @Entity
public class Message
extends Object
    Represents a Message record in the database
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

        public Message(String text,
               String subject,
               Date startDate,
               boolean recipientIsActive,
               User sender,
               User recipient,
               boolean recipientIsRead,
               boolean senderIsRead,
               boolean senderIsActive)
        Constructs a Message with the text, subject, date of added, recipient isAvtice status, sender, recipient, recipient isRead status, sender isActive status and sender isActive status.
        Parameters:
        text - The text of the message.
        subject - The subject of the message
        startDate - The date of sending the message
        recipientIsActive - The isActive status of the recipient
        sender - The sender of the message
        recipient - The recipient of the message
        recipientIsRead - he isRead status of the recipient
        senderIsRead - The isRead status of the sender
        senderIsActive - The isActive status of the sender
